com.ieireference.system.web

Class WebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ieireference.system.web.WebClient

  • public final class WebClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a client for web. Contains functions to download file asynchronous and a thread for this. Events can be used for Java Forms like download file with JProgressBar.
    See Also:
    DownloadListener, DownloadEvent

      Initializes and set events

                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets events.
        Parameters:
        downloadProgress - Add the events for DownloadFileAsync(URL, String)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If call this function when DownloadFileAsync(URL, String) is running.

      • DownloadFileAsync

        public void DownloadFileAsync(java.net.URL file,
                              java.lang.String output)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                              java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException
        Start asynchronous download. Is needed set events before of start.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to Download.
        output - The output of file download.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If you call when running or Events are null.
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException - If you try call with a file existent in output

      • DownloadThreadStop

        @Deprecated
public void DownloadThreadStop()
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Deprecated. 
        CAUTION. This method stop the download thread, please use if need. Thread.stop() is Deprecated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If thread is null or not alive when call this.

      • IsThreadAlive

        public boolean IsThreadAlive()
        Returns:
        If thread not null, return true or false if alive else false.
